Regulation Name(s): Clostridium difficile Toxin Gene Amplification Assay
Analyte(s): Clostridium difficile toxin B gene (tcdB) DNA
Specimen Container(s): BD MAX Cdiff Sample Buffer Tube
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD MAX Cdiff Assay, an automated real-time PCR assay on the BD MAX System for qualitative detection of Clostridium difficile toxin B gene from stool specimens.
Indications for Use Summary: Aids in the diagnosis of Clostridium difficile infection by qualitative detection of toxin B gene (tcdB) in human liquid or soft stool specimens from patients suspected of CDI, using automated real-time PCR on the BD MAX System.
